summary:
For many DSLs such as templating languages it's important to use code
generation to achieve acceptable performance in Python. The current
version of Jinja went through many different iterations to end up where
it is currently. This talk walks through the design of Jinja2's compiler
infrastructure and why it works the way it works and how one can use
newer Python features for better results.
title: Code Generation in Python: Dismantling Jinja
